GameConditionDef.label: lights off
GameConditionDef.description: A cyberattack has hit the colony. This particular one seems to be aimed at light fixtures within the colony.\n\nIt should pass within a day.
GameConditionDef.endMessage: The effects of the malware have stopped.
GameConditionDef.letterText: A cyberattack has hit the colony. This particular one seems to be aimed at light fixtures within the colony.

GameConditionDef.label: production halt
GameConditionDef.description: A cyberattack has hit the colony. This particular one seems to be aimed at powered sources of production within the colony.\n\nIt should pass within a day.
GameConditionDef.endMessage: The effects of the malware have stopped.
GameConditionDef.letterText: A cyberattack has hit the colony. This particular one seems to be aimed at powered sources of production within the colony.

GameConditionDef.label: climate suspension
GameConditionDef.description: A cyberattack has hit the colony. This particular one seems to be aimed at powered sources of heat and cold within the colony.\n\nIt should pass within a day.
GameConditionDef.endMessage: The effects of the malware have stopped.
GameConditionDef.letterText: A cyberattack has hit the colony. This particular one seems to be aimed at powered sources of heat and cold within the colony.

GameConditionDef.label: overclock
GameConditionDef.description: A cyberattack has hit the colony. This particular one appears to indiscriminately hit all powered buildings, forcing them to run dangerously hot.\n\nIt should pass within a day.
GameConditionDef.endMessage: The effects of the malware have stopped.
GameConditionDef.letterText: A cyberattack has hit the colony. This particular one appears to indiscriminately hit all powered buildings, forcing them to run dangerously hot.

GameConditionDef.label: overclock
GameConditionDef.description: A cyberattack has hit the colony. This particular one tampers with the Identification Friend or Foe (IFF) systems of any infected turret, turning it against the colony temporarily.
GameConditionDef.endMessage: The effects of the malware have stopped.
GameConditionDef.letterText: A cyberattack has hit the colony. This particular one tampers with the Identification Friend or Foe (IFF) systems of any infected turret, turning it against the colony temporarily.
